title: Elon Musk Moves to Form Content Moderation Council. Here’s What We Know.
description: The announcement appeared to be a step back from Mr. Musk’s position that Twitter should be an anything-goes platform.
dc:creator: Sheera Frenkel
media:description: Elon Musk, Twitter’s new owner, announced in a tweet today that the company would form a “content moderation council.”
